participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a hardworking and passionate individual who loves nature. He has a calm demeanor and enjoys sharing his knowledge about bee farming.
participant_1.background: my name is george. i've zero family that i'm close to. my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i am a bee farmer.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Sophia is ambitious and stylish, with a keen eye for luxury items. She is determined to succeed in her career despite facing familial challenges.
participant_2.background: my family does not support my career choices. my dream car is a rolls royce ghost. i often shop for shoes and watches. i like shopping. i currently work for a watch dealer.
